description.@en: My ways may be unorthodox and shocking, but it gets things done.

data.notes:
Intellectual Trait

Professions of this Archetype are learned, lettered and understand the value of the written word. They are of higher means, malleable and socially mobile.

effect.@en: Whenever someone fails an Intelligence-based Skill Test, you can interject and have them re-roll using your Base Chance without spending Coins. However, they gain 3 Conflict.
